text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Waaaaaa-! Trainer-chan, move, move!～!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: ―Wahya!
Suddenly, Mayano Top Gun came running, and I caught her.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Fuwaa～ Sorry about that, trainer! 
Thanks for catching me!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Ehehe. It's like we've been in this situation before―

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Hey! I found you Mayano-san! 
Today, you 'will' do your homework!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Aaahhh! I shouldn't be talking to you!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Sorry trainer, see you later! 
Scramble ～～～～～!!!

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
Ah! Ughh, she's so fast……! Excuse me trainer, 
could you please tell her

text_block_list.name: Math Teacher
text_block_list.text:
If she don't turn in her homework, 
she's gonna have to do it in her training time!

I rushed to find Mayano Top Gun and found her hiding under a desk 
in the trainer's office……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Waa!? Oh…… it's you trainer-chan! Then 
I don't care if I'm found♪

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Where's the teacher? She's not here, 
is she? Hah～ I had a hard time!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
What the hell! The teacher only gave Maya homework 
because Maya dozed off during class!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
The reason why I dozed off during class was 
because I was reviewing what I learned last night. 
Her lessons could be learned just by reading the textbook…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Also during the test, I was told to show my work but… 
If you know the answer, that's all that matters, right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Why is she making me go through 
all that trouble～!?
choice_data_list: But you can't train if you don't do your homework.
But you can't train if you don't do your homework

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: What…………?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Aaaaahhhh!!! Th, that's right……! I forgot that 
I have to make-up during training time!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Ugh, I used to not train at all so I was fine with that, 
but now…… I'm in trouble!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Since I've decided that I'm going to be 
a sparkling, mature Uma Musume with my trainer……!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
Mmmm～…… but I can't believe I 
have to do my homework…… Hmmmph～……

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: Discover?
choice_data_list: You discovered the purpose of training right?
You discovered the purpose of training right?

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: That was…… yeah, I did.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: New discoveries…… Hmmmm～～～～.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text: I can only think of it as 'boring' now. But…

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
If you say so…… 
I'll give it a shot.

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
And in return! let's go on another date♪ 
like an adult, of course!

text_block_list.name: Mayano Top Gun
text_block_list.text:
It's ok right? Right? 
Waa～ I'm looking forward to it. Where should we go next～!!
With that said, Mayano Top Gun humingly finished her homework……
